transcript:
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein.
Hello.
Hello.
Haa ji sir boliye kaun?
Haa sir good morning Saransh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kal baat hui thi na aap se business manager baat kar raha tha. Dopahar me maine call kiya tha but aap busy the sir baat hi nahi ho payi aap se mera. Aapka bhi shayad miss call aaya hua tha sir.
Sir maine aapko do call kiya tha us time par.
Haa mai bhi dusri call pe tha to maine bhi call kiya but aap shayad occupied the to baat hi nahi ho payi.
Sir woh kya hai Prahlad ke father ki kal death ho gayi isliye.
Haa?
Prahlad ke father ki kya kal death ho gayi?
Death hui matlab samjha nahi mai. Death death.
Death matlab mujhe dobara bataiye aap kya keh rahe hai.
Prahlad ke father ki death ho gayi isliye.
Achha kisi ke father ki death ho gayi thi?
Haa.
Achha achha achha achha. Chaliye koi baat nahi. Isliye humne tab baat nahi ki.
Koi baat nahi sir koi baat nahi. Mai keh raha tha Raja Marble Traders se ho maine kal catalog pe kuch kuch cheezo ki review ki thi sir. Mujhe cheezo me se lagta hai ki sahi ho jayengi to shayad aap logo se response achha aane lagega. To aap kahi to mai catalog.
Sir aap refund kara do.
Sir refund ke liye maine baat ki aapne senior se but mujhe permission nahi mil rahi hai. Unhone clearly mana kar diya. Senior bol rahe hai ki refund allowed hi nahi hai sir maturity ke basis pe mai kaise refund karu.
Sir refund aap to kara do bas hame refund hi chahiye. Nahi sir aise baat aise nahi hai ki matlab mere haath me hai refund karana. Company ke policy hai dekhiye agar koi aur issue related to waise hota hai ki haa business hi nahi karna hai aage ya kuch aisa issue hota to mai definitely aage baat karta ya GST me koi issue hota but yaha par to saari cheeze okay hai na sir. Maturity ke basis pe company kabhi bhi refund provide nahi karti hai. Even aap hamara woh jo jo aapne proposal aap choose kiya hoga na to aapne bhi ye cheez mention ki hai maturity ke basis pe koi refund allow nahi karte sir. Baat ye hai.
Aapke industry ka achha khasa business log le rahe hai aap hi ke competitor hai jinka catalog mai khud dekh raha hu Makrana me kal hi mai check kar raha tha. Aap jaante honge Awertan walo ko jaante ho Awertan Marble Arts?
Nahi nahi hum to kisi ko nahi jaante. Glorious Marble walo ko jaante ho?
Sir hame dekho unse kya matlab woh purane customer hai hame pata hai. Sir baat baat matlab ki nahi hai baat ye hai ki aapki industry me agar mai 10 logo ko business de pa raha hu aap hi ke shehar ke right aap 11ve hai aur mai aapko bhi business de sakta hu. Mere ko problem ye hai ki mai aapko business kyu nahi de pa raha hu mujhe woh cheez sahi karni hai sir.
Baat ye hai aapne jo paisa diya tha IndiaMART ko ye soch ke to nahi diya tha na ki mai do mahine baad refund le lunga teen mahine baad refund le lunga ye soch ke diya tha aapne?
Hame kya bola gaya tha ki sir aapko ek se do mahine ke andar mil jayega.
Aur nahi mila to?
Sir hame teen mahine ho gaye kya milega milega kab milega fir saal bhar hone wala hai. Sir agar agar agar nahi milega to fir company to ye cheez nahi bolti hai ki hum aapko nahi milega to refund denge. Humne ki marketing ke liye aapka paisa liya 12 mahine ke liye liya hai. Hamari responsibility 12 mahine me ki humne agar aapse paisa liya 40 rupay liya hai right we are damn sure ki aap logo ko do chaar customer aise aaram se mil jayenge pure saal me ki aap apna paisa nikal lenge aur benefit bhi kama lenge. Sir woh milne bhi chahiye na mil nahi rahe fir kya kare hum. Aapko to sirf teen hi mahine abhi teen mahine hue hai to sir teen mahine ho gaye aur kya milega milega fir kya pata chalega.
Sir agar koi customer mil gaya to chaar mahine paanch mahine me aur ho sakta hai ki aapko aakhri ke last ke do mahine me customer mil jaye. Sir customer ki koi surety nahi hai sir. Sir kuch nahi milega. Sir customer ki conversion ki surety na chhote package me hoti hai na bade package me hoti hai. It totally depends ki kaunsa customer aapko kab click kar jaye. Aapko mai bata du Makrana Makrana me na sir kam se kam 80 se 85 supplier hai jo isi product pe listed hai sir right aur har customer me matlab ye samajh lijiyega 90% customer satisfied hai waha pe. 80 me se 60 customer aise hai jinko achha khasa business mil raha hai aur woh aisa thodi na hai ki unhe har customer convert ho raha hai. Woh 50 customer se baat karte hai to shayad unka ek customer convert ho jaata hoga aur us customer se woh paisa achha nikal lete hai. Baat ye hai ji aur agar mere paas refund ka procedure hota to mujhe refund dene me koi problem nahi hoti sir mere paas refund hai hi nahi maturity ke basis pe. Company to clear bolti hai ki hum aapke marketing ke liye paisa le rahe hai koi bhi customer aapka product search karega hum aapki visibility dikhayenge yaha par right. Ab haa number of product agar hum add karenge options add karenge to customer ka footfall badhega ho sakta hai ki aapko waha se conversion achha mil jaye sir aur mai wohi karna chah raha hu aapke catalog pe.
Sir aap to mai bol raha hu na sir nahi hoyega ab.
Aapne mann me mindset agar ye bana liya ki nahi hoga sir to fir to nahi hone wala agar aap. Sir hame sir hame teen mahine me bilkul sab kuch pata chal gaya hai ki kuch nahi milega iske andar. Aisa nahi hota sir teen mahine me aap kisi cheez ko judge nahi kar sakte teen mahine me to ek nayi shop agar kholte hai to market bhi nahi ban pata. Sir mai kya keh raha hu. Sir mai kya keh raha hu hamare ek dost ne aur bhara hai ji 1.5 lakh wale wala to 150000 wahi form bhara hai isme. Abhi tak kuch bhi nahi mila usko bhi.
Kisko?
Mere dost ko bhi ek aur usne form bhara hai. Kaunsi company ka kya naam hai? Company ka naam mujhe pata nahi hai abhi. Mai bataunga aapko puch kar. Company ka naam pata karke bataiyega mai aapko detail bhi bataunga ki 1.5 lakh rupay ka unhone procedure bhara hai to 1.5 lakh rupay ka service liya hai usme kya liya hai unhone aur kitni category pe liya hai aur kitna response mil raha hai. Actually me bhai me aisa dekhiye aaj ki tarikh me bhai bhai ka saga nahi hota sir right to koi aapko ye baith ke nahi batayega ki mujhe response mil raha hai ki nahi mil raha hai agar mil bhi raha hai. Nahi nahi sir mera sir. Khaas ye koi dusra nahi hai hame puch kar hi bhara hai maine kaha par dost. Chalo khaas hai mai maan liya khaas hai right lekin agar unhone bhi 1.5 lakh rupay diya hai to ye soch ke nahi diya hoga ki do mahine me business nahi mila to wapas. Sir company woh bhi woh bhi usse gaye hai woh bhi bol rahe hai mujhe. Kya? Ki kaha phas gaye hum to aa hi nahi rahe bilkul hi. Dekhiye sir jo aap logo ko lag raha hai phas gaye hai na aapko hum bata de aap hi ki tarah 70-80 log yaha se business kama rahe hai positive mindset se customer ko aage dijiye to aapko bhi business milne ke chances badh jayenge. Sir kitna wait kare yaar. Dekhiye mere ko personally aap se request ye rahega ki catalog pe agar milke kaam karte hai to shayad hum business achha nikalenge sir. Mai aapko help kar sakta hu catalog ko enrich karne me achhe se so that aapke paas business conversion aa sake. But agar aap mujhse ye expect karenge ki refund kara do sir mere paas refund ka policy nahi hai is cheez ko lekar baat ye hai sir. Mai aapke catalog pe working karne ke liye khud working karne ke liye taiyar hu aapke catalog ko sahi karne ke liye aapko taki response aur employment aa sake but agar aap mujhse bolenge ki nahi Saransh refund hi karao kuch nahi mil raha conversion woh mere haath me nahi hai woh mai nahi kar sakta agar ho paata mai definitely karta. In fact aap aap jo hai jo ye product hai jisme aap deal karte hai white marble temple me deal karte hai marble temple aur marble fountains wagera me?
Sir dekho ye sab hai na mera friend chalata hai ye.
Aap nahi chalate?
Mai bhi chalata hu woh bhi chalate hai hum teeno sir active rehte hai yaar phone ke andar. To teeno active rehte hai achhi baat hai sir teeno active rehte hai tab to aap logo ke liye customer ki requirement aur bhi badhiya se aap deal kar sakte ho. Sir aaye to kare na sir aati nahi hai woh aati to ek second hum click karte hai woh aati nahi hai. Catalog ko sahi karne ki zarurat hai thoda sa aapke catalog ko agar hum sahi karenge to aapko business response milne lagega ye keh raha hu mai. Aapne apna catalog khol ke dekha hai ek baar bhi?
Sir hum roz catalog khol ke dekhte hai. To catalog khol ke dekhte hai kuch samajh paaye ki isme gadbad kaha aa rahi hogi aap achha ek baat sochiye aap businessman hai aap hi ke shehar ke 50 logo ne paisa lagaya hua hai jisme se bahut saare log khush hai aur satisfied hai aapko business nahi mil raha hai usme to gadbad hogi na sir process me kahi na kahi to gadbad ho rahi hogi na catalog me aap mujhse ye bolte hai ki sir maine catalog se kitni baar sudhare nahi sir batao catalog kitni baar sudhare. Pehle woh Deepak bhaiya bole woh catalog sudharo usse sudhar diya kuch nahi farak pada. Haa. Preeti ji ne bola catalog sudharo usse bhi kuch farak nahi pada hai.
Aap marble tulsi stand me deal karte hai na sir?
Haa kya keh rahe ho? Marble tulsi marble tulsi stand me deal karte hai na sir? Sir usme kya hai sir ye aa rahe hai sir 10000 10000 sir. Pochata nahi hai sir ye cheeze ye waha par. Kya cheez? Sir ye sir rate isme nahi pochati hai. Ab 10000 me kya hota hai sir mujhe bataiye aap. 7000 me kya hota hai?
Are mai puch raha hu aap is product me deal karte hai sir? Hmm? Aap is product me deal karte hai na mention kara hua hai. Deal to karte hai. To mere paas ek requirement aaya hua hai jo ki 19 ghante pehle aaya hua tha Delhi se 18 inch ka Makrana marble ka requirement mang raha tha unhone tulsi stand ka deal kar payenge isse? 18 inch ka requirement tha.
Sir dekho mai mere partnership baat karunga wohi bolega jab hoyega kuch nahi hoyega sir. Hum dost thak gaye sir isko bol bol ke. Dekhiye woh agar aap ye bolenge ki partner se baat karke hoga aap mujhe partner ke number dijiye mai partner se discussion kar leta hu sir. But dekhiye aapne paisa business lene ke liye diya tha aisa nahi ki aapne apne partner ke liye registration karaya tha aapne apne liye bhi registration karaya hua hai sir. Haa mai. Haa. Sir dono dono hi hai hum hai to dono soch samajh ke kuch bharenge na kyu. Haa. Dono dono ne registration mutual understanding se karaya tha na sir to wohi bol rahe hai ki aap yaha pe. Haa. Ki sir milega milega abhi tak kuch nahi mila hai. To sir aap use to kijiye sir is system ko mai aapko mere paas to. Sir roz use kar rahe hai. Sir ye aisa kaise use hai ki aap logo ki jo requirement aayi hai aap usko consume hi nahi kar rahe. Baar baar. Sir sir ye kaise kar le sir ye batao mujhe. Haa? Aaj ki koi requirement aayegi jab karenge na. Sir kaise portal pe dikha raha hoga marble tulsi stand ki ek requirement aayi hui hai. Mai kya keh raha hu sir abhi marble water woh hamare water fountain hote hai home mandir hote hai uski aayegi jab lena isme kya hai sir. Exact to cheez. To aapki yahi to product hai na marble fountain marble tulsi marble white. Jacket. Oh jacket. Aari bhai. Lambi wali aati hai ki nahi maro. Sir mai ek minute wapas call karta hu aapko. Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer states that they are not getting buyleads.

- Customer says friend also not getting leads.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund not possible due to company policy.

- Executive offered to help improve the catalog.

- Executive explained how to use the portal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after a minute.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, catalog, buyleads, subscription
